title: Awaken: Awaken to Pleasure / Awaken the Senses
description: Two classic stories about giving in to your deepest desires from New York Times bestselling author Nalini Singh AWAKEN TO PLEASURE Taylor Reid hadn't seen Jackson Santorini since she made the difficult decision to shut him out of her life one year ago. Unable to extinguish the flame she carried for her devastatingly handsome—and married—boss, walking away had been her only option. Now Jackson was back in her life, newly widowed and in the perfect position to aid Taylor's quest for custody of her younger brother, but only on one condition: she become his wife and give him the child he longs for. Still haunted by her own painful past, Taylor is wary of the proposal, but the closer she gets to Jackson, the harder it is to deny the intense desire he's awoken in her…. AWAKEN THE SENSES Charlotte Ashton has always felt like she didn't belong—until she falls into the loving arms of worldly Alexandre Dupree. The sensual winemaker is consulting at her family's vineyard when he spots shy Charlotte, and is utterly spellbound by her beauty. After stumbling upon a diary containing her innermost fantasies, he soon learns she isn't exactly the demure innocent he first assumed her to be, and as he teases out the passionate side she's kept hidden, it's not long before the seducer becomes the seduced….
author: Nalini Singh
